books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Kate Quinn
books.description: A British journalist and a Russian female bomber pilot go after a Nazi war criminal.
books.name: THE HUNTRESS

books.author: by Don Winslow
books.description: The third book in the Power of the Dog series. Art Keller’s fight to keep drugs out of the country has taken a complicated turn.
books.name: THE BORDER

books.author: by James Patterson and Max DiLallo
books.description: Caleb Rooney, a police detective and celebrity food truck chef, must clear his name of murder allegations.
books.name: THE CHEF

books.author: by Joanne Fluke
books.description: Hannah Swensen teams up with a former lover to find out who left a dead body in her bedroom.
books.name: CHOCOLATE CREAM PIE MURDER

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Grace Healey investigates the fates of 12 women who were sent to occupied Europe to help the resistance during World War II.
books.name: THE LOST GIRLS OF PARIS

books.author: by Lisa Jackson
books.description: Two stories featuring Denver and Colton McLean: "Tender Trap" and "Aftermath."
books.name: BACKLASH

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: After getting dumped in the same week, three sisters rebuild their lives.
books.name: CALIFORNIA GIRLS

books.author: by Penelope Ward
books.description: A college student has feelings for an older man over the course of a summer.
books.name: WHEN AUGUST ENDS

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: D.D. Warren and Flora Dane investigate whether a pregnant woman shot and killed her husband.
books.name: NEVER TELL

books.author: by Faith Hunter
books.description: The fourth book in the Soulwood novel series. Nell uses her magic to help a group that solves paranormal crimes.
books.name: CIRCLE OF THE MOON

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: Jessica Farris’s life unravels when she signs up for Dr. Shields’s psychology study.
books.name: AN ANONYMOUS GIRL
